imdb.title: Drifters
imdb.plot: Various historical fighters are summoned from across time to wage war on each other, with the fate of the world in the balance.

episodes.title: Fight Song
episodes.plot: In the aftermath of the Battle of Sekigahara, warrior Shimazu Toyohisa is suddenly thrust into a mysterious world where he is shocked to encounter the supposedly Oda Nobunaga and the historical figure Nasu Suketaka Yoichi.

episodes.title: Footsteps
episodes.plot: As Orte sets the Elven village ablaze in the distance, Nobunaga and Yoichi are dragged into action by Toyohisa's fearless forward charge. Meanwhile on the other side of the world, the march of the Black King is about to commence.

episodes.title: Army of Ours - Sortie at Dawn
episodes.plot: The Black King's army is marching on the Northern Wall of Carneades while the Octobrists attempt to convince Carneades' defenders to hand over control of the defensive force to Hannibal and Scipio. This will be the "Ends" debut on the battlefield.

episodes.title: Active Heart
episodes.plot: The Black King is dealing with the aftermath of the conquest of Carneades. Simultaneously, on the other side of the empire, the Drifters are preparing for backlash and starting to grow their own ambitions.

episodes.title: Bring Back Love
episodes.plot: As the lord's suppression force marches into the seemingly abandoned Elven village, a trap laid by the Drifters waits to be sprung. As a result of the clash, the lack of Elven women in the village is explained, and the flames of vengeance ignited.

episodes.title: Men of Destiny
episodes.plot: Toyohisa dashed into the enemy's castle to rescue elf-girls without any hesitation. But he fires up at the sight that he saw there, then he tries to kill all the enemy in the castle. Meanwhile, Count Saint-Germi appears in the House of Lords with his attendants in Verlina, capital city of Orte Empire.

episodes.title: Chaos Diver
episodes.plot: The heroine of France Joan of Arc and a Marshall of France Gilles de Rais attack the old castle in the order of Black King, the leader of the "Ends". Toyohisa and Yoichi confront them.

episodes.title: Mystery - Call Me
episodes.plot: With the dust settling throughout the battlefield, Toyohisa declares that he acts based on his own rules. Far from the battlefield, the axis powers of World War II reunite, and proceed to fall apart. Elves liberated, next up...the Dwarves.

episodes.title: Serious Bomber
episodes.plot: Gadolka begins with the culmination of the effort spent on black powder and ends with a paradigm shift in the warfare of the new world. The full extent of the Dwarves suffering reveals itself, and a new cog is added to the war machine.

episodes.title: Baba Yetu
episodes.plot: After freeing the Dwarves, the Drifters' plans continue getting derailed as unexpected guests show up. Meanwhile, far to the north, the Black King's plan continues to unfurl as the Ends regroup and recover in preparation to strike back.

episodes.title: The Adventures of the Pistol Daimyou (Bullet Counting Song)
episodes.plot: The coup begins yet right from the start there is an unexpected wrench thrown into the plans. The roar of muskets now rips across the new world, and the Drifters find their places leading armies.

episodes.title: Staring at Shinsengumi (The Song of the Fervid Kyuushuu Man)
episodes.plot: As Toyohisa and Hijikata dance a deadly duet in the inferno of a capital, Nobunaga slowly moves to turn the tide. As the ashes settle on the city, a Pyrrhic victory is achieved with the line between victory and defeat not being so clear cut.

episodes.title: OVA: Rewrite
episodes.plot: The day after the battle in Verlina, Nobunaga and Saint-Germi think of strategies for the future. Meanwhile, two spies from the Octobrist Organization sneak into a castle town of Northern-Wall where Ends army have been staying.

episodes.title: OVA: Bring on a War
episodes.plot: The merchant guild Gu-Binnen led by a noble man Shylock VIII crushed the Orte Empire Navy with the cooperation of one of Drifters, Yamaguchi Tamon, a rear admiral in the Imperial Japanese Navy. Nobunaga asks Saint-Germi for the diplomatic negotiations with Gu-Binnen.

episodes.title: OVA: The Outlandish Knight
episodes.plot: Kan'no Naoshi has unified anthropomorphic animal tribes as a god. He heads for Gu-binnen with Scipio Africanus as soon as he got a letter from Tamon. And now, Ends army launch a full-scale invasion into human countries.
